text: Rescued from an Eagle's Nest is a 1908 American silent action-drama movie directed by J. Searle DawleyRESCUED FROM AN EAGLE'S NESTThomas Leitch. Crime Films and stars D. W. Griffith, Henry B. Walthall, Miss Earle, and Jinnie Frazer. ==Actors== * D. W. Griffith as father * Henry B. Walthall as fellow woodsman * Miss Earle as mother * Jinnie Frazer as Baby ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:1900s action movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:American action movies
title: Rescued from an Eagle's Nest
